raw_body: ABEYWICKREMA IRANDI (nee GOONEWARDENE) – Beloved wife of late Sumith,​ mother of Yasas,​ Sumedha and Roshini,​ mother-in-law of Vishni,​ Vishani and Suranjeeva,​ grandmother of Heshan and Suchita,​ Isuri and Bavantha and Jaliya,​ great grandmother of Jayden and Cayden,​ passedaway peacefully on 4th August 2023.053283
